snippet: CBS, which will broadcast the Super Bowl on Feb. 3, sold all the available commercial time — unless a marketer wants so much to be included that money is no object.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; CBS says that if advertisers are willing to pay premium of up to $6 million, network will find room in its sold out schedule for the Super Bowl broadcast on Feb 3.
lead_paragraph: CBS, which will broadcast the Super Bowl on Feb. 3, sold all the available commercial time — unless a marketer wants so much to be included that money is no object.

headline.seo: A Sellout for Super Bowl Commercial Time
headline.main: Super Bowl Commercial Time Is a Sellout
headline.print_headline: Super Bowl Commercial Time Is a Sellout
